name: ResponseiQ
slogan: Sales Acceleration and Conversion Optimisation Platform
description:
We connect a businesses salespersons to their internet leads by phone in under 60 seconds. Allowing business to speak to leads at the optimum time for success. MIT have proven calling within 5min vs 10min yield a 900% higher chance of connection.
How It Works?
Email is forward to ResponseiQ, we parse/extract information, call available sales agents and first to answer claims the lead, using text to voice the agent hears all required important information and is then connected with the lead at the most optimal time. 
Result?
Increased connections, increased appointments, increased sales, and a far more efficient sales/response process. 
Reporting?
Our platform tracks connection rates, response times, appointments/follow ups set/rates etc. All lead data is logged in the system, can be logged in at agent/management/company levels. All calls are recorded for training.
In Dev
Website SMS to sales agents feature
ScoreiQ - customisable call/agent scoring for training and feedback purposes.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Scott Lee
team.bioHtml: Founder ResponseiQ. Strong business, economics and sales background. Self taught tech and SaaS lover. Strong personality. A leader intellectually and socially.

team.name: Sam Lawes
team.bioHtml: Experienced sales leader, new business hunter and sales trainer heading up Sales and Development at ResponseiQ

jobs.title: Marketing Executive
jobs.description:
Who we are:

We’re a rapidly growing B2B sales acceleration and conversion optimisation platform startup that aims to change the way businesses connect to their potential leads and customers. We currently have an office in London (Angel), South Africa, and a Berlin office opening soon. 

Who we are looking for:

We’re looking for a Marketing Executive to join the marketing team as the 2nd marketing hire in a team that will be rapidly growing. You will be responsible for all things related to communication and content and have a chance to build your own strategy from scratch! As hard as we work we also love to have fun together so we are looking for someone who can add personality to our team and be part of our growing community. 

You’ll be energetic and enjoy working in a fast paced environment that presents you with new challenges. You will bring a new skill set to the team but also be willing to learn and get involved with new ones. 

What you will be doing:

-Work closely on a daily basis with the Head of Marketing to deliver and execute a strong marketing plan

-Define and build ResponseiQ’s brand through all things copy, content and communications

-Develop and lead content partnerships and PR to get as many people as possible to know who we are and what we do

-Create white papers and product information content

-Work with our customers to build and publish case studies

-Take full ownership of our blog and get as much engagement as possible

-Take full ownership of our website copy and content

-Organise and plan our trade events

-Assist with digital marketing strategy and maintenance 


You will need:

-1-4 years previous B2B marketing experience

-A passion for technology and growing a startup

-Excellent communications skills in both written and spoken English, essential for this position

-Have a solid understanding of digital content, communications. Previous experience with email campaigns and blog writing is also a bonus

-Experience organising trade shows and events is also a bonus

-Be able to work both in a team and independently

-Be well organised with the ability to multitask and prioritise workload

-Be proactive and comfortable diving in or where help is needed

-Be knowledgeable of and have some experience with social media
Experience with WordPress and Hubspot is a bonus

-Have an eagerness to gather and use data to optimise your work
A sense of humour and a willingness to get involved with our socials

What we can offer you:

-Central London office in a coworking space with lots of other great startups

-Opportunity to be an early joiner in a rapidly growing company

-Opportunity to progress your career and define our marketing strategy

-Free fruit, coffee, tea and more in the office

-Free gym membership (and time to use it)

-Free drinks every Thursday

-Yoga and other activity in the office

-Regular team lunches and socials

-We also have an office dog called Taco who also helps out with marketing
